<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Write a value of a particular endianness, and increment the buffer past that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> value&#95;type, std::size&#95;t alignment = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/#a92fe024386465eeb8aeb7c78371549d7af6b11e8bcea1b0b70051b197f2cb3f84">unaligned</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> value&#95;type&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t</a> = std::make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Read a value of a particular endianness from memory, for a location</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that starts at the given bit offset within the first byte.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> value&#95;type, endianness endian, std::</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> alignment&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd"><Highlight kind="normal">&#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> value&#95;type <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd">readAtBitAlignment</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;memory,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   uint64&#95;t startBit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(startBit &lt; 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (startBit == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#acfdf941f45bc58470ed8423b98862486">read&lt;value&#95;type, endian, alignment&gt;</a>(memory);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Read two values and compose the result from them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    value&#95;type val&#91;2&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(&amp;val&#91;0&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2fd576fb00a760ba803c8a171bff051a">LLVM&#95;ASSUME&#95;ALIGNED</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">               memory, (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">detail::PickAlignment&lt;value&#95;type, alignment&gt;::value</a>)),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(value&#95;type) &#42; 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift bits from the lower value into place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> lowerVal = val&#91;0&#93; &gt;&gt; startBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask off upper bits after right shift in case of signed type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> numBitsFirstVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(value&#95;type) &#42; 8) - startBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    lowerVal &amp;= ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; numBitsFirstVal) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the bits from the upper value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> upperVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">        val&#91;1&#93; &amp; (((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift them in to place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    upperVal &lt;&lt;= numBitsFirstVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lowerVal | upperVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Write a value to memory with a particular endianness, for a location</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that starts at the given bit offset within the first byte.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> value&#95;type, endianness endian, std::</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> alignment&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f">writeAtBitAlignment</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;memory, value&#95;type value,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">                                uint64&#95;t startBit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(startBit &lt; 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (startBit == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#add1f2d1d972957d22186f4ec92f985f6">write&lt;value&#95;type, endian, alignment&gt;</a>(memory, value);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Read two values and shift the result into them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    value&#95;type val&#91;2&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(&amp;val&#91;0&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2fd576fb00a760ba803c8a171bff051a">LLVM&#95;ASSUME&#95;ALIGNED</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">               memory, (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">detail::PickAlignment&lt;value&#95;type, alignment&gt;::value</a>)),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(value&#95;type) &#42; 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask off any existing bits in the upper part of the lower value that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we want to replace.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;0&#93; &amp;= ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> numBitsFirstVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">        (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(value&#95;type) &#42; 8) - startBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> lowerVal = value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (startBit &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask off the upper bits in the new value that are not going to go into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the lower value. This avoids a left shift of a negative value, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is undefined behavior.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      lowerVal &amp;= (((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; numBitsFirstVal) - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now shift the new bits into place</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      lowerVal &lt;&lt;= startBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;0&#93; |= lowerVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask off any existing bits in the lower part of the upper value that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we want to replace.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;1&#93; &amp;= ~(((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Next shift the bits that go into the upper value into position.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> upperVal = value &gt;&gt; numBitsFirstVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask off upper bits after right shift in case of signed type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    upperVal &amp;= ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;1&#93; |= upperVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finally, rewrite values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    val&#91;1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2fd576fb00a760ba803c8a171bff051a">LLVM&#95;ASSUME&#95;ALIGNED</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">               memory, (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">detail::PickAlignment&lt;value&#95;type, alignment&gt;::value</a>)),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">           &amp;val&#91;0&#93;, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(value&#95;type) &#42; 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace endian</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::size&#95;t ALIGN = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">PickAlignment&lt;ValueType, Alignment&gt;::value</a>&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
